import React, { useState } from "react"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import axios from "axios"; function Add_Products() { const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ cate_name: "", product_name: "", desc: "", price: "", discounted_price: "", img_url: "", created_at: "", }); const onChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormValue({ ...formValue, id: new Date().getTime().toString(), [name]: value, }); }; const onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const response = await axios.post( `http://localhost:3000/${formValue.cate_name}`, formValue ); if (response.status === 201) { toast.success("Your product has been added successfully."); setFormValue({ ...formValue, cate_name: "", product_name: "", desc: "", price: "", discounted_price: "", img_url: "", status: "Available", }); } }; return (

Add Prodcuts

Add Prodcuts in your Website and Manage Products page into Admin Panel using this Form.

); } export default Add_Products;
